text: "Empire of the Clouds" is a 2016 song by English heavy metal band Iron Maiden and taken from their 16th studio album The Book of Souls. Clocking in at 18 minutes long it is Iron Maiden longest song ever. It is based on the 1930 British R101 airship that crashed in Northern France during its maiden voyage. ==Track listing== Category:2016 songs Category:2010s ballads Category:Iron Maiden songs Category:Heavy metal
title: Empire of the Clouds
